DellServiceRoot.description: This is the schema definition for the additional OEM properties to complement DMTF Service Root Schema.
DellServiceRoot.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent an OEM Service Root for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

IsBranded.description: Property to represent OEM system as DELL.
IsBranded.longDescription: The value of the property identifies OEM system as DELL.

ManagerMACAddress.description: Property to represent MAC Address of the iDRAC.
ManagerMACAddress.longDescription: The value of the property represents MAC Address of the iDRAC.

ServiceTag.description: Property to represent ServiceTag of Computer System.
ServiceTag.longDescription: The value of the property specifies the system service tag.

title: #DellServiceRoot.v1_0_0.DellServiceRoot
